name: Pumpkin-Stuck Evil Spirit
story:
Lavril, who had decided to follow Lewisia, wandered around the shopping district of Orvel with Lewisia to enjoy the Halloween carnival event. 
 After all, to live among humans, one must take matters into their own hands and find a large crowd to blend in. 
 While Lavril was absent-mindedly warching the people enjoy the carnival, their gaze was caught upon a cute doll that resembled them on a selling stand. 
 Lavril stood still and looked at the doll for a long time. They were eventually swept by the crowd, and Lavril lost the sight of the doll. But Lewisia noticed Lavril's interest and managed to purchase it. 
 After buying the doll, Lewisia cast a protection spell on it, so that it will hide the presence of the holder to protect the Little Darkness from danger. She then gave the doll to Lavril.
